data.name: Obsolete Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
We still have so much to discover. The walls of these ancient tunnels reveal long lost secrets, but what lies beyond those walls? What revelations still await, in these places even light doesn’t dare show?

  • In this first soundtrack, Virgil Marrel flies us beyond Obsolete’s cavernous walls, and shows us music has neither limit nor frontiers.
  • Close your eyes and fells let your mind be transported far from the ruins of this fallen world, at the edge of a universe where the songs of the stones surpass the test of time and degradation, and tell with a moving obscurity the story of a decomposed civilization.

data.short_description: The original soundtrack of Obsolete, 19 minutes of immersion in this fallen world
